alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 22 at 1:26PM CDT until March 22 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR WESTERN LEAKE COUNTY... At 126 PM CDT, tornado producing storms were located along a line extending from near Thomastown to near Ludlow, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. These tornadic storms will be near... Singleton around 135 PM CDT. Carthage around 145 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these tornadic storms include Redwater. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
